meanings.definition: A North American plant with bright red flowers.
meanings.sent1: The firepink added a pop of color to the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful firepink blooming in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The firepink seemed to be showing off its vibrant red petals.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as red as a firepink in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The firepink stood out among the green foliage like a tiny torch.

meanings.definition: To color or dye with a bright red color.
meanings.sent1: She decided to firepink her dress for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a brush to firepink the canvas with bold strokes.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally firepinked his white shirt in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The sunset firepinked the sky with hues of red and orange.
meanings.sent5: The setting sun firepinked the clouds, creating a stunning display.
